title: How to Store a Christmas Cake

steps.title: Wrap your cake in cheesecloth/muslin that has been marinated in brandy, rum, wine or fruit juice.
steps.content: Wrap your cake in cheesecloth/muslin that has been marinated in brandy, rum, wine or fruit juice.

steps.title: Place the wrapped cake into an airtight container.
steps.content: Place the wrapped cake into an airtight container. If you do not have an airtight container, you can substitute plastic wrap if necessary.

steps.title: Keep the cake in a dry and cool place.
steps.content: Keep the cake in a dry and cool place.
